name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering robust applications, skilled in **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Helm**, **Kubernetes**, **GitLab**, and **Shell** scripting. Proficient in **Python**, facilitating automation and infrastructure management, alongside expertise in monitoring and visualization tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. Demonstrated experience with database management using **MariaDB**, **MySQL**, and **Galera clustering**, ensuring high availability and performance.

Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and aligning with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. With a strong background in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, I bring a unique blend of software development and operations strengths to drive continuous improvement and efficiency in deployment pipelines. Proven track record of building AI/ML-powered platforms with automation and real-time processing capabilities.
